modules.title: Titanium
modules.summary: The top-level Titanium module.

modules.title: Titanium.API
modules.summary: The top-level API module, containing methods to output messages to the system log.

modules.title: Titanium.Accelerometer
modules.summary: The top-level Accelerometer module, used to determine the device's physical position.

modules.title: Titanium.Analytics
modules.summary: Used for transmitting developer-defined Analytics events to the Appcelerator Analytics product.

modules.title: Titanium.Android
modules.summary: The top level Android module.

modules.title: Titanium.Android.Calendar
modules.summary: The Android.Calendar module provides proxies and methods for accessing the native Android \ncalendar functionality.

modules.title: Titanium.Android.NotificationManager
modules.summary: Module for managing status bar notifications.

modules.title: Titanium.App
modules.summary: The top level App module. The App module is mainly used for accessing information about the \napplication at runtime.

modules.title: Titanium.App.Android
modules.summary: A module used to access Android application resources.

modules.title: Titanium.App.Properties
modules.summary: The App Properties module is used for storing application-related data in property/value pairs \nthat persist beyond application sessions and device power cycles.

modules.title: Titanium.App.iOS
modules.summary: The top-level App iOS module, available only to iOS devices, that includes the facilities to \ncreate and manage local notifications and background services.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud
modules.summary: The top level Cloud module.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.ACLs
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS access control lists (ACLs).

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Chats
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS chat messages.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Checkins
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS checkins.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Clients
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS clients.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Emails
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS Email service.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.KeyValues
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS Key-Values storage.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Objects
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS custom objects.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.PhotoCollections
modules.summary: Provides methods for ACS photo collections.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Photos
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS photos.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Places
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS places.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Posts
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS posts.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.PushNotifications
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS push notification channels.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Reviews
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS reviews.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.SocialIntegrations
modules.summary: Provides methods for access ACS social integrations.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Statuses
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS Statuses.

modules.title: Titanium.Cloud.Users
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing ACS user objects.

modules.title: Titanium.CloudPush
modules.summary: Provides methods for accessing Android push notifications from ACS using the MQTT protocol.

modules.title: Titanium.Codec
modules.summary: A module for translating between primitive types and raw byte streams.

modules.title: Titanium.Contacts
modules.summary: The top-level Contacts module, used for accessing and modifying the system contacts address book.

modules.title: Titanium.Database
modules.summary: The top-level Database module, used for creating and accessing the\nin-application SQLite database.

modules.title: Titanium.Facebook
modules.summary: The top level Facebook module.\n

modules.title: Titanium.Filesystem
modules.summary: The top level filesystem module, used to access files and directories on the device.

modules.title: Titanium.Geolocation
modules.summary: The top level Geolocation module. The Geolocation module is used for accessing device location based information.

modules.title: Titanium.Geolocation.Android
modules.summary: Module for Android-specific geolocation functionality.

modules.title: Titanium.Geolocation.MobileWeb
modules.summary: The Mobile Web specific geolocation capabilities.

modules.title: Titanium.Gesture
modules.summary: The Gesture module is responsible for high-level device gestures such as orientation changes \nand shake gestures.

modules.title: Titanium.Locale
modules.summary: The top level Locale module.

modules.title: Titanium.Map
modules.summary: The top level Map module.  The Map module is used for creating in-application native maps.

modules.title: Titanium.Media
modules.summary: The top level Media module.

modules.title: Titanium.Media.Android
modules.summary: Android-specific media-related functionality.

modules.title: Titanium.Module
modules.summary: Base type for all Titanium modules.

modules.title: Titanium.Network
modules.summary: The top level network module.

modules.title: Titanium.Network.Socket
modules.summary: Socket module, used for creating sockets.

modules.title: Titanium.Platform
modules.summary: The top-level Platform module.  The Platform module is used to access the device's platform-related \nfunctionality.

modules.title: Titanium.Platform.Android
modules.summary: The Android-specific Platform module, used to access the device's platform-related functionality.

modules.title: Titanium.Stream
modules.summary: Stream module containing stream utility methods.

modules.title: Titanium.UI
modules.summary: The main Titanium.UI module.

modules.title: Titanium.UI.ActivityIndicatorStyle
modules.summary: A set of constants for the styles available for Titanium.UI.ActivityIndicator objects.

modules.title: Titanium.UI.Android
modules.summary: The Android-specific UI capabilities. All properties, methods and events in this namespace will \nonly work on Android systems.

modules.title: Titanium.UI.Clipboard
modules.summary: A module used for accessing clipboard data.

modules.title: Titanium.UI.MobileWeb
modules.summary: The UI capabilities specific to Mobile Web. All events, methods and properties in this namespace \nwill only work on this platform.

modules.title: Titanium.UI.iOS
modules.summary: Apple iOS specific UI capabilities.  All properties, methods and events in this namespace will \nonly work on Apple iOS devices.

modules.title: Titanium.UI.iPad
modules.summary: iPad specific UI capabilities.

modules.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone
modules.summary: The iPhone/iPad-specific UI capabilities.  All properties, methods and events in this namespace \nwill only work on Apple iOS systems.

modules.title: Titanium.Utils
modules.summary: The top-level Utils module, containing a set of JavaScript methods that are often useful when \nbuilding applications.

modules.title: Titanium.XML
modules.summary: The top level XML module.  The XML module is used for parsing and processing XML-based content.

modules.title: Titanium.Yahoo
modules.summary: The top level Yahoo module.  The Yahoo module is used for accessing Yahoo related API services.

objects.title: AcceptDict
objects.summary: Options object for the accept method.

objects.title: AcceptedCallbackArgs
objects.summary: Argument object passed to the accepted\ncallback when a listener accepts a connection.

objects.title: ActivityResult
objects.summary: Simple object passed to the\nstartActivityForResult callback.

objects.title: BarItemType
objects.summary: Object describing a button bar or tabbed bar item.

objects.title: CameraMediaItemType
objects.summary: A media object from the camera or photo gallery.

objects.title: CameraOptionsType
objects.summary: Simple object for specifying options to showCamera.

objects.title: CloudACLsCheckResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudACLsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudChatGroupsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudChatsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudCheckinsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudClientsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudEmailsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudKeyValuesResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudObjectsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudPhotoCollectionsPhotosResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudPhotoCollectionsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudPhotosResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudPlacesResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudPostsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudPushNotificationConfig
objects.summary: Simple object for specifying token retrieval options to retrieveDeviceToken.

objects.title: CloudPushNotificationErrorArg
objects.summary: A simple object passed to the retrieveDeviceToken error callback.

objects.title: CloudPushNotificationSuccessArg
objects.summary: A simple object passed to the retrieveDeviceToken success callback.

objects.title: CloudPushNotificationsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudReviewsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudSocialIntegrationsResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudStatusesResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: CloudStreamProgress
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback as a request is transmitted or received.

objects.title: CloudUsersResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when a request finishes successfully or erroneously.

objects.title: ConnectedCallbackArgs
objects.summary: Argument object passed to the connected callback when the socket connects.

objects.title: CoverFlowImageType
objects.summary: Simple object for defining a single image in a cover flow view.

objects.title: CreateBufferArgs
objects.summary: Arguments to be passed to createBuffer

objects.title: CreateStreamArgs
objects.summary: Argument passed to createStream.

objects.title: CropRectType
objects.summary: Simple object for describing the crop rectangle for an image.

objects.title: DecodeNumberDict
objects.summary: Named parameters for Titanium.Codec.decodeNumber.

objects.title: DecodeStringDict
objects.summary: Named parameters for Titanium.Codec.decodeString.

objects.title: Dictionary
objects.summary: Plain JavaScript object.

objects.title: Dimension
objects.summary: A simple object consisting of the position and size measurements.

objects.title: EncodeNumberDict
objects.summary: Named parameters for Titanium.Codec.encodeNumber.

objects.title: EncodeStringDict
objects.summary: Named parameters for Titanium.Codec.encodeString.

objects.title: ErrorCallbackArgs
objects.summary: Object passed to the error callback when the socket enters the ERROR state.

objects.title: FacebookDialogResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the dialog callback when a dialog is completed or canceled.

objects.title: FacebookGraphResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the graph API callback, in response to a\nrequestWithGraphPath call.

objects.title: FacebookRESTResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the REST API callback when a request completes (successfully\nor unsuccessfully).

objects.title: Font
objects.summary: An abstract datatype for specifying a text font.

objects.title: ForwardGeocodeResponse
objects.summary: Simple object returned in the callback from the \nforwardGeocoder method.\nNote that Android includes a number of extra fields.

objects.title: GeocodedAddress
objects.summary: Simple object representing a place, returned in the callback from the \nreverseGeocoder method.

objects.title: Global
objects.summary: The APIs that reside in the global scope, which may be called without a namespace prefix.

objects.title: Global.JSON
objects.summary: Global JSON object providing the parse and stringify methods.

objects.title: Global.String
objects.summary: The JavaScript built-in String type.

objects.title: Global.console
objects.summary: Console logging facilities.

objects.title: Gradient
objects.summary: A simple object defining a color gradient.

objects.title: GradientColorRef
objects.summary: A simple object consisting of a color and an offset.

objects.title: HeadingData
objects.summary: Simple object holding compass heading data.

objects.title: HeadingResponse
objects.summary: Argument passed to the getCurrentHeading callback.

objects.title: ImageAsCroppedDict
objects.summary: Simple object used to specify options for imageAsCropped.

objects.title: LocationCoordinates
objects.summary: Simple object holding the data for a location update.

objects.title: LocationProviderDict
objects.summary: Simple object describing a location provider.

objects.title: LocationResults
objects.summary: Argument passed to the getCurrentPosition callback.

objects.title: MapLocationType
objects.summary: Simple object used as an argument to setLocation.

objects.title: MapPointType
objects.summary: Simple object representing a point on the map.

objects.title: MapRegionType
objects.summary: Simple object representing a map location and zoom level.

objects.title: MapRouteType
objects.summary: Simple object defining a map route.

objects.title: MatrixCreationDict
objects.summary: Simple object passed to Titanium.UI.create2DMatrix to initialize a matrix.

objects.title: MediaQueryInfoType
objects.summary: A full query descriptor for a filtering predicate.

objects.title: MediaQueryType
objects.summary: A specifier for a media library query. By default, filters perform an exact match.

objects.title: MediaScannerResponse
objects.summary: Simple object passed to the scanMediaFiles callback.

objects.title: MovieSize
objects.summary: Simple object used to describe the size of a movie.

objects.title: MusicLibraryOptionsType
objects.summary: Simple object for specifying options to openMusicLibrary.

objects.title: MusicLibraryResponseType
objects.summary: Simple object passed to the openMusicLibrary\nsuccess callback function.

objects.title: NotificationParams
objects.summary: Dictionary object of parameters used to create a notification using \nTitanium.App.iOS.scheduleLocalNotification.

objects.title: PhotoGalleryOptionsType
objects.summary: Simple object for specifying options to \nopenPhotoGallery.

objects.title: PlayerQueue
objects.summary: A simple object for specifying a queue of media items.

objects.title: Point
objects.summary: A pair of coordinates used to describe the location of a Titanium.UI.View.

objects.title: PreviewImageError
objects.summary: The parameter passed to the error callback of PreviewImageOptions.

objects.title: PreviewImageOptions
objects.summary: Options passed to Titanium.Media.previewImage.

objects.title: PumpCallbackArgs
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback each time the \npump operation has new data to deliver.

objects.title: PushNotificationConfig
objects.summary: Simple object for specifying push notification options to\nregisterForPushNotifications.

objects.title: PushNotificationData
objects.summary: A simple object representing a push notification.

objects.title: PushNotificationErrorArg
objects.summary: A simple object passed to the \nregisterForPushNotifications error callback.

objects.title: PushNotificationSuccessArg
objects.summary: A simple object passed to the \nregisterForPushNotifications success callback.

objects.title: ReadCallbackArgs
objects.summary: Argument passed to the read callback when an asynchronous read operation\nfinishes.

objects.title: ReverseGeocodeResponse
objects.summary: Simple object returned in the callback from the \nreverseGeocoder method.

objects.title: ScreenshotResult
objects.summary: The parameter passed to the Titanium.Media.takeScreenshot callback.

objects.title: ServiceIntentOptions
objects.summary: Options passed to Titanium.Android.createServiceIntent.

objects.title: TableViewAnimationProperties
objects.summary: A simple object for specifying the animation properties to use when inserting or deleting rows, or scrolling the table.

objects.title: TableViewContentInsetOption
objects.summary: Optional parameter for setContentInsets method.

objects.title: TableViewEdgeInsets
objects.summary: The parameter for setContentInsets method.

objects.title: TableViewIndexEntry
objects.summary: A simple object that represents an index entry in a TableView.

objects.title: ThumbnailResponse
objects.summary: Simple object passed to the thumbnail callback in response to the\nrequestThumbnailImagesAtTimes\nmethod.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.Activity
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of an Android Activity.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.Calendar.Alert
objects.summary: An object that represents a single alert for an event in an Android calendar.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.Calendar.Calendar
objects.summary: An object that represents a single calendar on Android.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.Calendar.Event
objects.summary: An object that represents a single event in an Android calendar.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.Calendar.Reminder
objects.summary: An object that represents a single reminder for an event in an Android calendar.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.Intent
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of an Android Intent.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.Menu
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of an Android Options Menu.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.MenuItem
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of an Android menu item.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.Notification
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of an \nAndroid Notification.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.PendingIntent
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of an Android PendingIntent.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.R
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of the Android system-wide resources class.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.RemoteViews
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of Android RemoteViews.

objects.title: Titanium.Android.Service
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of an Android service.

objects.title: Titanium.App.Android.R
objects.summary: The Titanium binding of the native Android R class, giving access to application resources.

objects.title: Titanium.App.iOS.BackgroundService
objects.summary: A service that runs when the application is placed in the background.

objects.title: Titanium.App.iOS.LocalNotification
objects.summary: A local notification to alert the user of new or pending application information.

objects.title: Titanium.Blob
objects.summary: A container for binary data.

objects.title: Titanium.BlobStream
objects.summary: Wrapper around Titanium.Blob that implements the Titanium.IOStream interface.

objects.title: Titanium.Buffer
objects.summary: Buffer is a mutable, resizable container for raw data.

objects.title: Titanium.BufferStream
objects.summary: Wrapper around Titanium.Buffer that implements the Titanium.IOStream interface.

objects.title: Titanium.Contacts.Group
objects.summary: An object which represents a group in the system contacts address book.

objects.title: Titanium.Contacts.Person
objects.summary: An object that represents a contact record for a person or organization in the system contacts \naddress book.

objects.title: Titanium.Database.DB
objects.summary: The Database instance returned by Titanium.Database.open or Titanium.Database.install.

objects.title: Titanium.Database.ResultSet
objects.summary: The ResultSet instance returned by Titanium.Database.DB.execute.

objects.title: Titanium.Event
objects.summary: The base type for all Titanium events.

objects.title: Titanium.Facebook.LoginButton
objects.summary: A Facebook login button.

objects.title: Titanium.Filesystem.File
objects.summary: Object representing a path to a file or directory in the device's persistent storage.

objects.title: Titanium.Filesystem.FileStream
objects.summary: Wrapper around Titanium.Filesystem.File that implements the Titanium.IOStream interface

objects.title: Titanium.Geolocation.Android.LocationProvider
objects.summary: Represents a source of location information, such as GPS.

objects.title: Titanium.Geolocation.Android.LocationRule
objects.summary: A location rule to filter the results returned by location providers.

objects.title: Titanium.IOStream
objects.summary: IOStream is the interface that all stream types implement.

objects.title: Titanium.Map.Annotation
objects.summary: Represents a labeled point of interest on the map that the user can click on.

objects.title: Titanium.Map.View
objects.summary: Map view is used for embedding native mapping capabilities as a view in your application.

objects.title: Titanium.Media.AudioPlayer
objects.summary: An audio player object used for streaming audio to the device, and low-level control of the audio playback.

objects.title: Titanium.Media.AudioRecorder
objects.summary: An audio recorder object used for recording audio from the device microphone.

objects.title: Titanium.Media.Item
objects.summary: A representation of a media item returned by openMusicLibrary or queryMusicLibrary.

objects.title: Titanium.Media.MusicPlayer
objects.summary: This object represents a music controller.

objects.title: Titanium.Media.Sound
objects.summary: An object for playing basic audio resources.

objects.title: Titanium.Media.VideoPlayer
objects.summary: A native control for playing videos.

objects.title: Titanium.Network.BonjourBrowser
objects.summary: A browser for the discovery and retrieval of Bonjour services available on the network.

objects.title: Titanium.Network.BonjourService
objects.summary: Describes a service on the network which is published by Bonjour.

objects.title: Titanium.Network.HTTPClient
objects.summary: HTTP client object that (mostly) implements the XMLHttpRequest specification.

objects.title: Titanium.Network.Socket.TCP
objects.summary: TCP socket that implements the Titanium.IOStream interface.

objects.title: Titanium.Network.TCPSocket
objects.summary: DEPRECATED: USE Titanium.Network.Socket.TCP WHERE POSSIBLE.  The TCPSocket instance returned from Titanium.Network.createTCPSocket.  This object represents a socket which either listens locally on the device for connections, or connects to a remote machine.

objects.title: Titanium.Platform.DisplayCaps
objects.summary: The Display Caps object returned by the Titanium.Platform.displayCaps property.

objects.title: Titanium.Proxy
objects.summary: The base for all Titanium objects.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.2DMatrix
objects.summary: The 2D Matrix is an object for holding values for an affine transformation matrix.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.3DMatrix
objects.summary: The 3D Matrix is an object for holding values for a 3D affine transform.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.ActivityIndicator
objects.summary: An activity indicator that lets the user know an action is taking place.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.AlertDialog
objects.summary: An alert dialog is a modal view that includes an optional title, a message and buttons, \npositioned in the middle of the display.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Animation
objects.summary: The Animation object defines an animation that can be applied to a view.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Button
objects.summary: A button widget that has four states: normal, disabled, focused and selected.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.ButtonBar
objects.summary: An iOS button bar component.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.CoverFlowView
objects.summary: Use Titanium.UI.iOS.CoverFlowView instead.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.DashboardItem
objects.summary: A dashboard item is a view that is displayed as an icon in a Titanium.UI.DashboardView.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.DashboardView
objects.summary: A dashboard view is an iOS Springboard-like view of Titanium.UI.DashboardItem items that may \nbe deleted and reordered by the user using its built-in edit mode.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.EmailDialog
objects.summary: An email dialog is a modal window that allows users to compose and send an email.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.ImageView
objects.summary: A view to display a single image or series of animated images.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Label
objects.summary: A text label, with optional background image.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.MaskedImage
objects.summary: A control that displays an image composited with a background image or color.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.MobileWeb.NavigationGroup
objects.summary: A Navigation Group implements a specialized view that manages the navigation of hierarchical \ncontent.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.MobileWeb.TableViewSeparatorStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the style that can be used for the separatorStyle property of \nTitanium.UI.TableView.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Notification
objects.summary: An Android Toast-style notification.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.OptionDialog
objects.summary: An option dialog is a modal view that includes a message and one or more option items positioned \nin the middle of the display on Android and at the bottom edge on iOS. On Android, buttons may \nbe added below the options.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Picker
objects.summary: A control used to select one or more fixed values.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.PickerColumn
objects.summary: A picker column, representing a selectable group of items in a Titanium.UI.Picker.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.PickerRow
objects.summary: A picker row, representing a selectable item in a Titanium.UI.Picker.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.ProgressBar
objects.summary: A progress bar.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.ScrollView
objects.summary: A view that contains a horizontally and/or vertically-scrollable region of content.\n

objects.title: Titanium.UI.ScrollableView
objects.summary: A view that encapsulates a horizontally-scrolling set of child views, known as pages, navigable \nusing its built-in horizontal swipe gestures.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.SearchBar
objects.summary: A specialized text field for entering search text.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Slider
objects.summary: A slider component with a draggable thumb.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Switch
objects.summary: An on/off switch control.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Tab
objects.summary: A tab instance for a TabGroup.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.TabGroup
objects.summary: A tabbed group of windows.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.TabbedBar
objects.summary: Use Titanium.UI.iOS.TabbedBar instead.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.TableView
objects.summary: A table view is used to present information, organized in sections and rows, in a \nvertically-scrolling view.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.TableViewRow
objects.summary: A table view row is an individual item in a table, organized into table view sections.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.TableViewSection
objects.summary: A table view section is a container within a table used to organize table view rows.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.TextArea
objects.summary: A multiline text field that supports editing and scrolling.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.TextField
objects.summary: A single line text field.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Toolbar
objects.summary: An iOS toolbar. See Titanium.UI.iOS.Toolbar instead.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.View
objects.summary: An empty drawing surface or container created by the method Titanium.UI.createView.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.WebView
objects.summary: The web view allows you to open an HTML5 based view which can load either local or remote content.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.Window
objects.summary: The Window is an empty drawing surface or container.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iOS.3DMatrix
objects.summary: Use Titanium.UI.3DMatrix instead.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iOS.AdView
objects.summary: The AdView is a view for display Apple iAds.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iOS.CoverFlowView
objects.summary: The cover flow view is a container showing animated three-dimensional images in a style \nconsistent with the cover flow presentation style used for iPod, iTunes, and file browsing.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iOS.TabbedBar
objects.summary: A button bar that maintains a selected state.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iOS.Toolbar
objects.summary: An iOS toolbar, which can contain buttons and certain other controls.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPad.DocumentViewer
objects.summary: A DocumentViewer provides in-app support for managing user interactions with files on the \nlocal system.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPad.Popover
objects.summary: A Popover is used to manage the presentation of content in a popover.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPad.SplitWindow
objects.summary: A SplitWindow is a window that manages the presentation of two side-by-side view \ncontrollers.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.ActivityIndicatorStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the styles available for Titanium.UI.ActivityIndicator objects.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.AnimationStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the animation styles used for view transitions.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.NavigationGroup
objects.summary: A Navigation Group implements a specialized view that manages the navigation of hierarchical \ncontent.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.ProgressBarStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the bar styles used on the style property of Titanium.UI.ProgressBar.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.RowAnimationStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the Animation Styles used for transition on table view rows.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.ScrollIndicatorStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the styles available for scrollbars used with Titanium.UI.ScrollView.scrollIndicatorStyle and Titanium.UI.TableView.scrollIndicatorStyle properties.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.StatusBar
objects.summary: A set of constants for the status bar style.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.SystemButton
objects.summary: A set of constants for creating standard iOS system buttons.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.SystemButtonStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the system button styles that can be used for the button style property.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.SystemIcon
objects.summary: A set of constants for the system icon styles that can be used on a tab group tab.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.TableViewCellSelectionStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the style that can be used for the selectionStyle property of \nTitanium.UI.TableViewRow.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.TableViewScrollPosition
objects.summary: A set of constants for the position value that can be used for the position property of \nTitanium.UI.TableView when invoking scrollToIndex.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.TableViewSeparatorStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the style that can be used for the separatorStyle property of \nTitanium.UI.TableView.

objects.title: Titanium.UI.iPhone.TableViewStyle
objects.summary: A set of constants for the style that can be used for the button style property of \nTitanium.UI.TableView.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.Attr
objects.summary: Represents an attribute of an Element.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.CDATASection
objects.summary: Used to include blocks of literal text containing characters that would otherwise need\nto be escaped.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.CharacterData
objects.summary: An interface extending Titanium.XML.Node with a set of attributes and methods for accessing character data in the DOM.\nImplements the DOM Level 2 API on Android and iOS. For reasons of compatibility with the javascript engine, text is represented by UTF-8 instead of UTF-16 on Android and iOS. Exposes the DOM Level 3 API implementation on Mobile Web.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.Comment
objects.summary: Represents the contents of an XML comment.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.DOMImplementation
objects.summary: The Titanium.XML.DOMImplementation interface provides a number of methods for performing operations that are independent of any particular instance of the document object model.Implements the DOM Level 2 API on Android and iOS. Exposes the DOM Level 3 API implementation on Mobile Web.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.Document
objects.summary: The DOM Document returned from Titanium.XML.parseString.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.DocumentFragment
objects.summary: A lightweight document object used as a container for a group of nodes.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.DocumentType
objects.summary: Each Titanium.XML.Document has a doctype attribute whose value is either 'null' or a Titanium.XML.DocumentType object.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.Element
objects.summary: Represents an element in a DOM document, a Titanium.XML.Node  defined by a start-tag and end-tag (or an empty tag). Elements may have attributes associated with them.\nImplements the DOM Level 2 API  on Android and iOS with some non-standard extensions. Exposes the  DOM Level 3 API implementation on Mobile Web.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.Entity
objects.summary: This interface represents an entity, either parsed or unparsed, in an XML document. Note that this models the entity itself not the entity declaration. The nodeName attribute that is inherited from Node contains the name of the entity. An Entity node does not have any parent.\nImplements the DOM Level 2 API on Android and iOS. Exposes the DOM Level 3 API implementation on Mobile Web.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.EntityReference
objects.summary: Represents an XML entity reference.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.NamedNodeMap
objects.summary: A key-value paired map that maps String objects to  Titanium.XML.Node objects. \nImplements the DOM Level 2 API  on Android and iOS. Exposes the  DOM Level 3 API implementation on Mobile Web.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.Node
objects.summary: A single node in the Document tree.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.NodeList
objects.summary: A list of Titanium.XML.Node objects. Implements the DOM Level 2 API on Android and iOS. Exposes the DOM Level 3 API implementation on Mobile Web.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.Notation
objects.summary: Represents a notation declared in the DTD.  Implements the DOM Level 2 API on Android and iOS. Exposes the DOM Level 3 API implementation on Mobile Web.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.ProcessingInstruction
objects.summary: A way to keep processor-specific information in the text of the document. Implements the DOM Level 2 API on Android and iOS. Exposes the DOM Level 3 API implementation on Mobile Web.

objects.title: Titanium.XML.Text
objects.summary: Represents the textual content of an Titanium.XML.Element or Titanium.XML.Attr Implements the DOM Level 2 API on Android and iOS. Exposes the DOM Level 3 API implementation on Mobile Web.

objects.title: WriteCallbackArgs
objects.summary: Argument passed to the write callback when an asynchronous\nwrite operation\nfinishes.

objects.title: WriteStreamCallbackArgs
objects.summary: Argument passed to the callback when an asynchronous\nwriteStream operation finishes.

objects.title: contentOffsetOption
objects.summary: Optional parameter for setContentOffset method.

objects.title: hideParams
objects.summary: Dictionary of options for the Titanium.UI.OptionDialog.hide method.

objects.title: hideStatusBarParams
objects.summary: Dictionary of options for the Titanium.UI.iPhone.hideStatusBar method.

objects.title: openWindowParams
objects.summary: Dictionary of options for the Titanium.UI.Window.open method.

objects.title: showContactsParams
objects.summary: Dictionary of options for the Titanium.Contacts.showContacts method.

objects.title: showParams
objects.summary: Dictionary of options for the Titanium.UI.OptionDialog.show method.

objects.title: showStatusBarParams
objects.summary: Dictionary of options for the Titanium.UI.iPhone.showStatusBar method.

objects.title: textAreaSelectedParams
objects.summary: Dictionary object of parameters for the Titanium.UI.TextArea.selected event that describes \nposition and length of the selected text.
